channel.description: Appendix A: Sample RHCSA Exam 1 Time Duration:3 hours Passing Score:70% (210 out of 300) All settings performed in the virtual machines must survive system reboots, or you will lose marks. Setup for Sample Exam 1: RHEL 9 Server with GUI 20GB disk for the OS with default partitioning. 2x300MB disks and a network interface. (.293GiB for virt-manager) Do not configure the network interface or create a normal user account during installation.
